name: Sky invaders (Cheese_Hunter)
description:
Hey! I am Julian(Cheese_Hunter) and i made my first complete game!

It is an pretty fast-paced arcade style game inspired by afterburner but then top down. I made all the assets myself. If you want to have a bit of fun for a couple minutes, try the game out! Also every asset is free to use, but please credit me when used.

to play, first extract the file. then open the txt file named "How-To-Play.txt". There will be the instructions. I will also upload a tutorial and showcase on my Youtube channel:

youtube.com/@cheesehunter_

Here is the official sound track:

You can also find a .wav file in the "audio" folder if you want to.
